meaningMnemonic: In terms of an <kanji>individual</kanji> <kanji>person</kanji>... well, that's <vocabulary>personal</vocabulary>, and depends on the <vocabulary>individual</vocabulary>. Whatever it is, an individual person has personal tastes, so make sure to think of that.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
